header_text: You are co-hosting a dinner party at your friend's apartment, and you just finished all the shopping. You start to sweat and feel your heart pounding after a couple of trips carrying the groceries up to the third floor. You feel a bit scared of these sensations. Unsure of whether they are good or bad, you decide to simply accept them.

elements.Text: Could you accept your racing heart as neither good nor bad?
